title: Search for reporting guidelines
cleaned_text: the QUAlity and Transparency Of health Research Key reporting guidelines, shaded green, are displayed first. [Show the most recently added records first](/reporting-guidelines-medical-specialty/complementary-and-alternative-medicine/&rgo=post_date). Some reporting guidelines are also available in languages other than English. Find out more in our [Translations section](http://www.equator-network.org/library/translations-of-reporting-guidelines/). For information about Library scope and content, identification of reporting guidelines and inclusion/exclusion criteria please visit [About the Library](http://www.equator-network.org/library/about-the-library/). Visit our [Help page](http://www.equator-network.org/help/) for information about searching for reporting guidelines and for general information about using our website.
